name: Learning Fun II
description:
Back of Box - Intellivision (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

A CHALLENGE FOR ALL AGES
Four exciting games in one game cartridge that strengthen your spelling and memory skills while you have fun!

CROSSWORDS
Create an orderly structure of words from a random jumble of letters! Players try to outscore each other by building longer words. (For 2 players.)

WORD ROCKETS
Exercise both manual dexterity and spelling skills – launch vowel "rockets" to complete words as they sail across the sky! (For 1 or 2 players.)

WORD HUNT
You're a monkey scrambling through the jungle, grabbing letters to build words . . . or stealing letters your opponent needs! (For 1 or 2 players.)

MEMORY FUN
Test your concentration! Uncover pairs of letters, looking for matches. Play alone or challenge a friend to a fast-moving, 2-players-at-once competition!


CROSSWORDS, WORDS ROCKETS, and WORD HUNT are enhanced versions of games previously released as WORD FUN. MEMORY FUN is an entirely new game!
